titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the Vietnam Women's Memorial Project, Inc. to establish a memorial on Federal land in the District of Columbia or its environs to honor women of the Armed Forces of the United States who served in the Republic of Vietnam during the Vietnam era.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.

bill.summary: 3/15/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Vietnam Women's Memorial Project, Inc., to establish a memorial on Federal land in the District of Columbia or its environs to honor women who served in the armed forces in Vietnam during the Vietnam era. Requires the establishment of such memorial to be in compliance with current Federal standards for commemorative works. Prohibits the United States from paying any expenses for the establishment of such memorial. Expresses the sense of the Congress that it would be appropriate to locate such memorial within the current site of the Vietnam Veterans Memorial in the District of Columbia.
